title: Why are they so mad? Part 1

author.bio_html: ping @Spy if i break

body: The sub consists of various irony posters: "dirtbag leftists" (stupidpol), third-positionists (consumeproduct), and of course deuxrama whose posters are on an indeterminate number of levels of irony.
body_html: The sub consists of various irony posters: "dirtbag leftists" (stupidpol), third-positionists (consumeproduct), and of course deuxrama whose posters are on an indeterminate number of levels of irony.

guild.description:
The future of intellectual discourse. Art Through Drama. Discovery By Shitposts. Knowledge From Memes.

Glory to the eternal chairman and his earthly incarnation @kek

ＲＵＬＥＳ

𝟏.Directly Linking to the dramatic post is REQUIRED in the description. Brigading is optional but highly encouraged.

body: People that think in algorithms made by someone else are a constant. Leftists NPCs are indeed remarkable and are in the spotlight because the cultural overlords advocate leftists ideals. But there is no shortage of NPCs on the right.
